alert.note: Alert for Henry; Obion; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:22PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Weakley, Obion and northwestern Henry Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 322 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mayfield to 6 miles east of Reelfoot Lake State Park. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Martin, Union City, Fulton, Dresden, South Fulton, Troy, Kenton, Obion, Sharon, Latham, Palmersville, Hornbeak, Woodland Mills, Rives, Samburg, Mason Hall, Mount Pelia, Glass, Jones Mill and Ruthville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
